title: Internally On Fire w/ Cameron Esposito
description:
This week we welcome the incomparable comedian, actor, and best-selling author Cameron Esposito (Save Yourself, NBC's A Million Little Things) to the podcast, but first, we kindly ask the coven to fire up your broomsticks because we’re starting off a bit witchy. Jessica explores the tough work of dimming her light to let others shine and June shares an Akashic spiritual reading she had that led to a magical experience with a hummingbird and a basketball hoop. Then, Cameron Esposito joins to give us the jolt of energy we NEEDED, and the three of them discuss growing up in the Catholic Church, shame, embarrassment, unlearning, and Cameron's “priest goals.” Deep Divers, remember that this isn’t a documentary and the stories WILL change.


 

For all things Cameron Esposito and where to buy her book go to www.cameronesposito.com 

Visit the Pinterest Board pinterest.com/thedeepdive

You can follow The Deep Dive on Twitter @thedeepdivepod

June Diane Raphael @MsJuneDiane on Twitter @junediane on Instagram

Jessica St. Clair @Jessica_StClair on Twitter @stclairjessica on Instagram

Check out the Jane Club at www.janeclub.com

Send us your The Deep Dive theme or any questions you might have to thedeepdive@earwolf.com
author: thedeepdive@earwolf.com (Earwolf)
